com.agorapulse.gru

Interface ResponseDefinitionBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HttpStatusShortcuts, JsonUnitOptionsShortcuts, WithContentSupport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultResponseDefinitionBuilder

    public interface ResponseDefinitionBuilder
extends HttpStatusShortcuts, JsonUnitOptionsShortcuts, WithContentSupport
    Sets expectations for the response after the controller action has been executed.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.agorapulse.gru.HttpStatusShortcuts

      • json

        ResponseDefinitionBuilder json(String relativePath)
        Sets an expected JSON response from given file. The file must reside in same package as the test in the directory with the same name as the test e.g. src/test/resources/org/example/foo/MySpec. The file is created automatically during first run if it does not exist yet with the returned JSON.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - an expected JSON response file
        Returns:
        self

        Returns:

      • json

        ResponseDefinitionBuilder json(String relativePath,
                               net.javacrumbs.jsonunit.core.Option option,
                               net.javacrumbs.jsonunit.core.Option... options)
        Sets an expected JSON response from given file. The file must reside in same package as the test in the directory with the same name as the test e.g. src/test/resources/org/example/foo/MySpec. The file is created automatically during first run if it does not exist yet with the returned JSON.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - an expected JSON response file
        option - JsonUnit option, e.g. IGNORING_EXTRA_ARRAY_ITEMS
        Returns:
        self other JsonUnit options e.g. IGNORING_EXTRA_ARRAY_ITEMS
